reviewText: This guy is amazing. Would be better in a DVD but get what you can. Mr Pang remains an extraordinary individual. I saw him about 38 years ago and you'd swear there had to be hidden wires somewhere! Virtually everyone in the class was left standing there with their mouths open - literally. Unbelievable! A combination of power, grace, and fluid precision I've never seen in another human being. Truly an honor to even be a witness.
